rect.style: fill: #3d7cb8; isolation: isolate; mix-blend-mode: multiply; stroke-width: 0px;

polygon.style: fill: #e41087; fill-rule: evenodd; isolation: isolate; mix-blend-mode: multiply; stroke-width: 0px;

line.style: fill: none; isolation: isolate; mix-blend-mode: multiply; stroke: #3d7cb8; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-width: 6px;
